credit_line: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
title: Dyer's record book
medium: Medium: cardboard, marbled paper and printed textile samples
description: Notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles. Contains 214 samples in various designs.
name: Dyer's record book
